statements.query: MATCH (sng:DBSubnetGroup)<-[:MEMBER_OF_DB_SUBNET_GROUP]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE sng.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH sng LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (sng) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete DBSubnetGroups that no longer exist and DETACH them from their RDS instances.

statements.query: MATCH (:DBSubnetGroup)<-[r:MEMBER_OF_DB_SUBNET_GROUP]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete the link between orphaned DB Subnet Groups and their RDS Instances.

statements.query: MATCH (:EC2Subnet)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:DBSubnetGroup)<-[:MEMBER_OF_DB_SUBNET_GROUP]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete the link between orphaned DB Subnet Groups and their EC2 Subnets.

statements.query: MATCH (n:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete RDS instances that no longer exist and DETACH them from all nodes they were previously connected to.

statements.query: MATCH (:RDSInstance)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: If an RDS instance still exists but is no longer associated with its old AWS Account, delete the relationship between them.

statements.query: MATCH (:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[r:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: If an RDS instance still exists and is no longer a part of its old EC2SecurityGroup, delete the relationship between them.

statements.query: MATCH (:RDSInstance)<-[r:IS_READ_REPLICA_OF]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: If an RDS instance still exists and is no longer a read replica of another RDS instance, delete the relationship between them.
